channel.title: Coding a 317 client.java (i need help is a few problems)
channel.description:
hi there everyone i need a bit of help,
well this is what i got to do before i can put my server online;
1. i need to add commands that work! 2. i need to fix all spell books because they are not reconising water runes 3. i need help on how to add text to an npc so i can talk to it (in the text box. not shouting out loud!) 4. i need to fix the player rights. i have changed my rights to 3 (owner i think) and it doesnt let be do some commands. 5. and i keep on no-clipping through walls when i follow a player!
i would really appreciate it if someone could help me! also you have probably guessed im a newbie to coding so please dont flame me you all was a newbie once!
many thanks
Nexus (soon to be proud owner of Nexuscape!) (p.s thank-you dannyscape for supplying a source and client for me :) )

item.title: Coding a 317 client.java (i need help is a few problems)
item.dc:creator: @Jed_Nexus Jed Nexus
item.description:
@Jed_Nexus wrote:

hi there everyone i need a bit of help,

well this is what i got to do before i can put my server online;

  1. i need to add commands that work!
  2. i need to fix all spell books because they are not reconising water runes
  3. i need help on how to add text to an npc so i can talk to it (in the text box. not shouting out loud!)
  4. i need to fix the player rights. i have changed my rights to 3 (owner i think) and it doesnt let be do some commands.
  5. and i keep on no-clipping through walls when i follow a player!

i would really appreciate it if someone could help me! also you have probably guessed im a newbie to coding so please dont flame me you all was a newbie once!

many thanks

Nexus
(soon to be proud owner of Nexuscape!)
(p.s thank-you dannyscape for supplying a source and client for me )
